_header: Twelfth day the high feast noble is to hold
_description: Epiphany in the South English Legendary

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Twelfþe dai þe heȝe feste nobliche is to holdeffor
                    four þinges of þulke day as þe gospel vs
                    tolde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…þeos ffour Miracles of vr lord þat ilke day weore i
                    doWel ouhte we halewe þat ilke day and honoure also
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
Twelueþe day þe heye festeNoble is it to holdeffor
                    foure þynges of þilk dayVs þe gospel
                    tolde…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…[ ] so he was i bore[ ] þey hym souhte[ ] aftur
                    nyne & twenty ȝerK[ ] fe[ ] þilk day…
BodLauMis463.Note:
First 5 lines only due to missing folios; written in half-lines because
                    in two columns.

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
The twelf the day þat heyȝ feste Good to ben hold isffor
                    four thynges on þat day fel As þe gospel tellys…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…But first whan þei com to bedlem þer child
                    layþe sterr vanesschid to north & neuer more noman it
                    sey

BodTan17.First Lines:
The twelfthe dai þe hiȝe feste noble is to holdeffor
                    foure þingis of þat day as þe gospel us tolde…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…þese foure meraclis of oure lord þus þei were I
                    doWe auȝte wel to holde þat day & honoure it also

OxfCCC431.First Lines:
tWelfþe day þe heye feste noble is to holdefor foure
                    þinges þulke day as þe gospel vs tolde…
OxfCCC431.Last Lines:
…þes foure miracles of oure lord þulke day were
                    idoWel auȝte men honoure þulke day & halwe also
OxfCCC431.Note: Portion of text lost due to mutilation of leaves.
OxfCCC431.Attributed Title: De epiphania domini nostri ihesu cristi (f. 3v)

CULAdd3039.First Lines:
Twelfte day sal we worship als ilk man ȝonge & oldeFor
                    foure skillez of þis day als þe gospel vs tolde…
CULAdd3039.Last Lines:
…As þis day þre kyngez til criste presaunt
                    broghtSone after þat he was borne & ful fer hym soght

CamCCC145.Editions:
D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.  
             The South English Legendary: Corpus Christi College Cambridge MS. 145
                and British Museum MS. Harley 2277, with variants from Bodley MS. Ashmole 43 and
                British Museum MS. Cotton Julius D.ix.
EETS
         o.s. 235 (1959), 236 (1956); repr. 1967: 1.4.

CamFitzMc128.First Lines:
Twelfthe day hegh fest nobly men shal holdffor iiij thinges on that
                    day as the gospel vs has told…
CamFitzMc128.Last Lines:
…Wel vs aght to halow that day and honor it alsoWhil our lord
                    thes iiij miracles that day wold do

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Twelfþe day þe heye ffeste noble is to holdeffor ffoure
                    þinges of þulke day as þe gospel vs tolde…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…Þis ffoure miracles of oure lord þulke day were
                    ydoWel auȝte we halwy þulke day and honoury al so

BLAdd10301.First Lines:
Twelþeday þe hye fest noble ys to holdefor foure
                    þynges of þat day as þe gospel us tolde…
BLAdd10301.Last Lines:
… þys foure myracles of oure lorde þat day were
                    ydoWel aȝte we halwy þat day and honure also

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: Tvelfte day þe heie feste nobiliche is to holdeffore four þynges of þulke day as þe gospel vs tolde…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …Wel aȝte me halewy þilke day & honoure alsoþis four miracles of our lord þilke day were ido
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum ii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 2v).
BLCottJulDIX.Attributed Title: De Epiphania (by scribe, left margin, f. 2v)

BLEge1993.First Lines: Tvelfþe day þe holi feste noble is to holdevor vour þinges of þilke day as þe gospel vs tolde…
BLEge1993.Last Lines: …þese foure miracles of oure lord þilke dai weren doWel auȝte men halewe þat day & honouren also>

BLEge2810.First Lines: Twelþe day þe heye feste nobliche is to holdeVor uoure þingis of þulke day as þe godsple of tolde…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …Wel aȝte me halwey þulke day & honour alsoþis voure myraclis of oure louird þulke day were ydo

Lam223.First Lines:
TWelfþe day hegh feste nobly mon shal holdeffor four
                    þinges on þat day as þe gospel vs has tolde…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Wel vs aught to halow þat day & honoure hit
                    alsoWhile oure lord þese four Miracles þat day wold
                    do

PROC473415.First Lines:
Tuelueþe dai þe heie feste nobliche is to holdeffor foure
                    þinges of þulke dai as þe gospel ous tolde…
PROC473415.Last Lines:
…Þulke dai þe þre kynges oure louerd presaund
                    brouȝteSone þo he was iboren & wel wide hym
                    souȝte

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
The twelfthe day is an high day and holy is to holdeFor foure
                    thinges that ilke day as the gospel vs tolde…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…The childe bigan to speke to hem goth blyue he seideTowarde
                    the londe of Iude; another sterre shall ȝow lede
